mapper.insert: insert into teacheringWork_practicalTrainingGuidance (classTeacher, status, name, credits, hours, studentNumber, loopsNumber, trainingType, results, note, year, semester) values (#{classTeacher,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{credits,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{studentNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loopsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trainingType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{results,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{semester,jdbcType=INTEGER})
